alert.note: Alert for Dunklin; Pemiscot (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 30 at 3:25PM CDT until March 30 at 3:45PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 PM CDT FOR EAST CENTRAL GREENE...EASTERN CLAY...WESTERN PEMISCOT AND DUNKLIN COUNTIES... At 325 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Bernie to near Kennett, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Kennett, Malden, Piggott, Hayti, Steele, Campbell, Rector, Senath, Chalk Bluff Natural Area, Clarkton, Cardwell, Holcomb, Hayti Heights, Arbyrd, Wardell, St. Francis, Pollard, Greenway, Glennonville and Bolton. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for eastern Arkansas...and southeastern Missouri. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
